findings.title: ULTW - Transfers Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet, which can be exploited by calling the `manualsend` method.

findings.title: PTRP - Potential Transfer Revert Propagation
findings.description: The contract sends funds to a marketingWallet and a developmentWallet as part of the transfer flow. These addresses can either be a wallet address or a contract. If the address is a contract then it may revert from incoming payment. As a result, the error will propagate to the token’s contract and revert the transfer.

findings.title: DDP - Decimal Division Precision
findings.description: The calculated value is the result of a division. Since Solidity has no floating types, then the result of a division may miss the decimals precision.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library produces unnecessary additional gas as Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0 do not need it.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.
